external_games.name: Clash of Empire: Epic Strategy War Game

name: Clash of Empire
summary: Do you wanna fight with your friends in a global battlefield? Are you adept at defense or attack? Can you use the few to defeat the many? Can you bring your empire to come to fight with your wisdom? Or even be the king who conquers the world through a great battle? Global service, real-time PK, Join COE to discover more surprises!
